Welcome to my channel! I’m a huge fan of The Simpsons and love sharing videos with fellow fans. All content is owned by Fox Broadcasting Company and its creators.

Disclaimer:

Copyright: All videos belong to 20th Television, Fox Broadcasting Company, and The Simpsons creators. I do not own any rights.
Fair Use: My Videos  are for entertainment, commentary, and appreciation. I add my own edits and opinions, making it transformative under fair use.
Credit: Full credit goes to Matt Groening, James L. Brooks, Sam Simon, and the entire production team.
No Monetization: This channel is not monetized. I share these clips purely out of love for the show.
Support the Original: Please support the creators by watching The Simpsons on official platforms and purchasing the series.
